title: Payload Telemetry Document
description: Stores data transmitted by payloads, either as-yet-unparsed or parsed.

type.title: Document Type
type.description: Indicates that this is a payload telemetry document. Should be 'payload_telemetry'.

data.title: Data
data.description: All the data about this transmission, including the raw transmitted data and any parsing results.

_raw.title: Raw Data
_raw.description: The raw transmitted data, as a base64 string. Must be uploaded by listeners.

_string.title: Raw Data String
_string.description: The ASCII representation of the raw data, if the data is all printable. Inserted by the parser.

_protocol.title: Protocol
_protocol.description: The protocol (habitat parser module) used to parse this transmission. Inserted by the parser.

_parsed.title: Parsed
_parsed.description: When present, records information relating to the parsing of the document. If absent the document has not been (or could not be) parsed. Inserted by the parser.

time_parsed.title: Time Parsed
time_parsed.description: The time, as an RFC3339 string, when the parser parsed this document.

payload_configuration.title: Payload Configuration Document ID
payload_configuration.description: The document ID of the payload_configuration document used to parse this document.

configuration_sentence_index.title: Payload Configuration Sentence Index
configuration_sentence_index.description: The index into the sentences list in the payload_configuration document used to parse this document.

flight.title: Flight ID
flight.description: The document ID of the flight associated with this telemetry, if it was parsed as part of a flight.

payload.title: Payload Callsign
payload.description: The callsign of the payload. Inserted by the parser.

sentence_id.title: Sentence ID
sentence_id.description: The sentence ID. Used to be known as 'sequence' or 'count'. Inserted by the parser, if configured to do so.

time.title: GPS Time
time.description: The GPS time; a string in the format of HH:MM:SS. Inserted by the parser, if configured to do so.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: The latitude of the payload. Inserted by the parser, if configured to do so.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The longitude of the payload. Inserted by the parser, if configured to do so.

altitude.title: Altitude
altitude.description: The altitude of the payload. Inserted by the parser, if configured to do so.

_fix_invalid.title: Fix Invalid
_fix_invalid.description: Flag that indicates that the values of time, latitude, longitude and altitude should not be used. Inserted by the parser, if configured to do so.

receivers.title: Telemetry Receivers
receivers.description: The listeners who received this telemetry and when they received it.

additionalProperties.title: Receiver
additionalProperties.description: Information about one receiver of this telemetry.

time_created.title: Time Created
time_created.description: The time, as an RFC3339 string, when the receiver created this document.

time_uploaded.title: Time Uploaded
time_uploaded.description: The time, as an RFC3339 string, when the receiver uploaded this document to the database.

latest_telemtry.title: Receiver Latest Telemtry
latest_telemtry.description: A CouchDB document ID for this receiver's most recent listener_telemetry document.

latest_info.title: Receiver Latest Info
latest_info.description: A CouchDB document ID for this receiver's most recent listener_information document.
